pages.text: $(o)Why does this even exist?$()$(br2)It should go without saying that you shouldn't shove a block of wood into a gun, but if you $(o)really$()want to, I won't stop you.
$(o)Deals $(l)2.0$()$(o) base damage. See $(l:ammunition/bullet_velocities_info)Guide: Bullet Damage$()$(o) for more information.$(br2)$(l)30%$()$(o) chance to misfire.
